contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox road |type=US |state=CO |route=350 |map=US 350 map.png |length_mi=73.00 |length_round=2 |length_ref=<ref name="dot">{{cite web|url=http://www.dot.state.co.us/app_DTD_DataAccess/Highways/index.cfm?fuseaction=Description&route=350&begRefPt=0&endRefPt=500&Printable=true|title=Segment list for US 350|accessdate=2007-05-13}}{{dead link|date=January 2013}}</ref> |established= |direction_a=West |terminus_a={{Jct|state=CO|US|160}} near [[Trinidad, Colorado|Trinidad]] |junction= |direction_b=East |terminus_b={{Jct|state=CO|US|50}} in [[La Junta, Colorado|La Junta]] |previous_type=CO |previous_route=348 |next_type=CO |next_route=368 }} '''U.S. Highway 350''' is a {{convert|73|mi|adj=on}} long northeast-southwest [[United States highway]] located entirely within the state of [[Colorado]]. ==Route description== US 350 starts at a junction with {{roadlink|state=CO|US|160}} northeast of [[Trinidad, Colorado]]. The highway runs northeast, past the [[Perry Stokes Airport]] and crossing the [[Purgatoire River]]. It then continues the rest of its length along a route chosen by the [[Atchison, Topeka and Santa Fe Railway]], and close to the Mountain Branch of the [[Santa Fe Trail]]. The highway passes just northeast of the [[PiÃ±on Canyon Maneuver Site]], then crosses [[Comanche National Grassland]] before a junction with {{roadlink|state=CO|SH|71}} going north.<ref name=cag>{{cite book |title=Colorado Atlas & Gazetteer |edition=Third |publisher=DeLorme |year=1997 |location=Yarmouth, Maine |isbn=0-89933-206-4 |page=100}}</ref> At [[La Junta, Colorado|La Junta]], the highway turns east on 5th Street, then north on Barnes Avenue before ending at a junction with {{roadlink|state=CO|US|50}}. ==History== Until the 1990s, US 350 continued on into Trinidad, where it intersected with [[Interstate 25 (Colorado)|Interstate 25]]. Prior to the creation of I-25, the road terminated at [[U.S. Highway 85 (Colorado)|U.S. Highway 85]] and [[U.S. Highway 87 (Colorado)|U.S. Highway 87]]. ==Major intersections== {{jcttop|length_ref=<ref name="dot"/>}} {{COint |county=Las Animas |location=none |mile=0.000 |road={{Jct|state=CO|US|160|city1=Trinidad|city2=Springfield}} |notes=}} {{COint |county=Otero |cspan=2 |location=none |mile=59.412 |road={{Jct|state=CO|CO|71|dir1=North|city1=Rocky Ford}} |notes=Southern terminus of SH 71}} {{COint |location=La Junta |mile=73.001 |road={{Jct|state=CO|US|50|city1=Pueblo|city2=Lamar}} |notes=}} {{jctbtm}} ==See also== ===Related U.S. Routes=== * [[U.S. Route 50]] ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== {{AttachedKML|display=title,inline}} *[http://usends.com/50-59/350/350.html Endpoints of US highways] [[Category:Three-digit U.S. Highways|50-3]] [[Category:U.S. Highways in Colorado|50-3]] [[Category:U.S. Route 50| 3]]
